div.p: (A) Plot of the variance in clutch size (solid line) and its approximate 95% confidence interval (dashed line) as a function of laying date. Values based on statistics of model 5 in Table 1 and applying the results of Fisher et al. (2004). (B) Plot of the reaction norms based on the fixed effects of elevation and slope and the Best Linear Unbiased Predictor (BLUP) values of model 5 for the individual femalesâ€™ reaction norms ( Table 1).
